price: 53. Nabii Yuusuf iyyeh :anu inni nafsi ma saytunnoysa diggah nafsi isi num umaaneh amrisa yi Rabbi kah nacroore num akke waytek, diggah yi Rabbi dambi cabti li xuwaw li kinni kay naqoosak kaal gace marah.
arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أُبَرِّئُ نَفۡسِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱلنَّفۡسَ لَأَمَّارَةُۢ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ إِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبِّيٓۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ubarri-u nafsī inna al-nafsa la-ammāratun bil-sūi illā mā raḥima rabbī inna rabbī ghafūrun raḥīmun
